mapper.select: select q.question from question as q inner join `group` as g on g.group_question_id = q.question_id where g.group_id = #{group_id};
select u.user_name, a.answer, a.answer_time from answer as a inner join user as u on u.user_id = a.answer_user_id where a.answer_group_id = #{answer_group_id}

select answer_group_id, answer_question_id from answer as a inner join group_question as gq on gq.quesiton_id = a.answer_question_id and gq.group_id = a.answer_group_id where question_id = #{question_id}
select u.answer_status from user as u inner join answer as a on a.answer_user_id = u.user_id where a.answer_question_id = #{question_id} and a.answer_user_id = #{user_id}
